snippet: A 19-year-old American left a letter for his parents expressing disgust with Western society before trying to board a plane in Chicago, intending to sneak into Syria to join the Islamic State, according to a federal criminal complaint released...
lead_paragraph: A 19-year-old American left a letter for his parents expressing disgust with Western society before trying to board a plane in Chicago, intending to sneak into Syria to join the Islamic State, according to a federal criminal complaint released Monday.

headline.main: Illinois: Teen Accused of Trying to Join Terrorists
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Teen Accused of Trying to Join Terrorists

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
